alert.note: Alert for Macon; Randolph (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 9:50PM CDT until May 06 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RANDOLPH AND SOUTHERN MACON COUNTIES... At 949 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bevier, or near Macon, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Macon, Bevier, Callao, Cairo, Jacksonville and Excello. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
